titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Study Group on Yale College (Dahl Committee) Records
Study Group on Yale College (Dahl Committee) Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday April 24, 2019 at 07:34

did.unittitle: Study Group on Yale College (Dahl Committee) records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of drafts, reports, correspondence, research material, and printed matter documenting the work of the Study Group on Yale College (Dahl Committee), which was formed in 1972 to make recommendations concerning the future of Yale College.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Study Group on Yale College

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 9-D (YRG 9-D), Records of Yale College committees.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Study Group on Yale College (Dahl Committee) Records (RU 431). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of drafts, reports, correspondence, research material, and printed matter documenting the work of the Study Group on Yale College (Dahl Committee), which was formed in 1972 to make recommendations concerning the future of Yale College.
